body.name: Holicolor 40pcs Play Food for Toddlers 1-3, Wooden Play Food Sets for Kids Kitchen, Pretend Cutting Play Food Toys with Wooden Tray, Educational Toy Kitchen Accessories Set for Girls Boys Gift
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 19 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Super Value Pack】: Our wooden play food toy kit contains 15 kinds of fruits and vegetables, 2 round-edged knives, 1 cutting board, and 1 storage box, in total 40 pieces. Bread, apple, pear, strawberry, lemon, tomato, carrot, pumpkin, eggplant, cucumber, fried egg, pork belly, chicken leg, and fish are included. This funny set can keep kids busy and play together!

【Premium Quality】: This cutting fruit and vegetable toy set is made of natural wood, coated with water-based environmental paint, non-toxic, and odorless. The round-edged design and smooth surface without burrs make it a safer and more environmentally friendly alternative to plastic toys.

【Creative Design】: The pieces are linked with high-quality velcro, which makes a "crunch" sound when cutting, allowing children to experience the joy of playing in the kitchen. The sizes perfect fits children's small hands and the wooden box makes it easy to store and carry.

【Early Educational Toys】: These kitchen toy accessories can develop children's cognitive and hand-eye-body coordination skills, improving spatial logic and creative thinking. Suitable for preschoolers, boys, girls, 3-4 years olds.

【Ideal Gift for Toddlers】: This pretended food kit comes in an exquisite gift box, perfect for various holidays, birthdays, or other occasions. Let kids enjoy screen-free fun and experience the joy of kitchen play！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our cuttable food set allows children to truly become fantastic little chefs! Each food item has clear shapes and details, helping them recognize different colors and types of food.

An excellent choice for family games Parents can play with their children, taking on the roles of chef and assistant, and prepare delicious virtual food together. This kind of parent-child interaction not only strengthens the bond between family members but also cultivates children’s cooperation and teamwork skills. Carefully selected materials This cuttable food set is made of high-quality materials with natural textures, free from splinters, and has a smooth and bright surface, effectively protecting children’s little hands. Parents can rest assured and let their children play freely without worrying about injuries. Stimulates children’s interests and creativity They can develop their minds and imagination by imitating real cooking processes. At the same time, this game also trains children’s hand-eye coordination, improves their observation skills, and enhances their responsiveness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Helps with kids develop different skills. The velcro is very strong so it'll require some force at the beginning to cut which helps the kids learn. Very durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to cut pretend items. My littles love feeling like prep chefs and creating imaginary dishes with this fun toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: This is a high quality set! We are very happy with the meals we have been served :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and the kids love it!
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect in our sub shop! We put in a retro 1970s play kitchen for the kiddos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My son loves play food
reviews.reviewText: My four year old son loves play food and I love to encourage his interest because I’m a foodie too! We both love this set. My personal favorite features of this set includes the wooden storage box which should last a while and the wooden cutting board. I also love that it came with multiple knives as my son will surely lose them. I also love that these toys are wood because wood last a long time and is biodegradable. The food items are pretty cute too. Some of them feature felt accents like leaves and it’s adorable. My son loves to chop up his vegetables and cook them on his fake stove/appliances (not included in this set). I like that the food adheres via Velcro. I think this set will last a long time depending on how rough my son is with it. The wooden parts probably won’t break but I’ve seen the Velcro eventually come off due to the constant pressure of “cutting” (but that was a different set, this set has yet to show signs of wear and tear).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality wooden food set
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this food play set for my 5 year old to increase his interest in "real world" food. He is autistic and struggles with eating, smelling and even touching many different foods so I wanted to make food fun. He loves being able to chop the food with the knives - especially likes hearing the chop when the knife hits the board. By identifying different play food, I then introduce him to the "real world" food and have him try to name the different foods as we're in the grocery store. He does struggle with textures so he has a hard time when it comes to touching/chopping the real thing, but he is a bit more interested in learning and interacting with some foods (even if he has yet to eat it). As far as the play set itself, these are nice, solid quality pieces. We haven't had any issues with the velcro coming off or paint chipping. I also like that it comes with a wooden storage box that fits all of the pieces, although I wish it had a cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute set!
reviews.reviewText: A childhood kitchen needs little cutting foods. And this is a great beginner set! It comes with a nice variety of pretty good quality food and they’re structured enough to where it really is a fun challenge to cut them apart. So the Velcro holds well enough to where it really does feel like you’re cutting haha Yes - i tried these myself! Really a good set. No complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but missing pieces
reviews.reviewText: This set is fun for my kids to play with, but it was missing the pineapple pieces.
